body:
Well it seems like it's my time to leave, I've been here for about 6 months, I came here an OCN player with little respect for this server, and slowly developed friendships with a few guys in the torunament community (Which is completely dead now)

I've hung around on the forums a while too, I've managed to start 'flame wars' because I voice my opinion and people around here can't understand the meaning of meme.

I'd like to thank:
Panda- Great friend, active member of my team
Broker- Another great friend and team member
Lyyris- Friend from OCN who is also a team member
Tel- Got me into Avicus in the first place, along with a couple of OCN guys
Zieno- Tollerant guy, good friend, also a member of my team
Tino- Dunno, he's just swaggy
Jozz- Hardest working staff member, although I've never actually got the chance to talk with him, I honestly respect him more than any other staff member
Dooz- Like Tino, just bad
Theo- Old member of team, good friend and staff member
Remy- Nice guy, underrated and chill
Notal- Pretty fat, not gonna lie
Spicy- Met him through Teamspeak, pretty damn derpy, but a cool guy.
Killerbye- Got me into Avicus, RIP.
Robo- Got me to stick around for a while with Immunity, good leader and chill guy
Hak- Co-leader of Immunity, also very chill


Feel free to ask away.
